meta.title: Imprint - raspb Webservices
meta.description: Imprint of raspb Webservices UG (in formation)

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.companyInFormation: The company is currently in formation.
imprint.vatIdText: VAT identification number according to § 27 a Value Added Tax Act:
imprint.euDisputeResolutionText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
imprint.euDisputeResolutionEmail: Our email address can be found above in the imprint.
imprint.consumerDisputeResolutionText: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
imprint.liabilityForContentText1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws pursuant to § 7 (1) TMG. However, pursuant to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we as service providers are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
imprint.liabilityForContentText2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific legal infringement. Upon becoming aware of corresponding legal infringements, we will remove these contents immediately.
imprint.liabilityForLinksText1: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking.
imprint.liabilityForLinksText2: However, a permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a legal violation. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
imprint.copyrightText1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
imprint.copyrightText2: Insofar as the content on this page was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are observed. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, we ask for a corresponding notice. Upon becoming aware of legal infringements, we will remove such content immediately.
